title: Sudoku for Kids
description: A colorful and engaging Sudoku game designed specifically for children with picture-based puzzles instead of numbers.

howToPlay: Choose a theme and difficulty level from the start screen
Click on empty cells to place pictures
Make sure no picture repeats in the same row or column
Complete the puzzle to win the game

controls.mouse: Click to select and place pictures
controls.touch: Tap to interact on mobile devices

tips: Start with easier levels to learn the rules
Look for rows or columns with fewer empty spaces
Use the hint system if you get stuck

introduction: Sudoku for Kids transforms the classic number puzzle into a fun, visual experience perfect for young learners. Instead of numbers, children work with colorful pictures and themes.
features: Multiple colorful themes to choose from
learningObjectives: Develop logical thinking and problem-solving skills
